item.title: Israel keeps Gaza border crossing closed while reducing aid deliveries

item.title: Coinbase boosts investment in India’s CoinDCX, valuing exchange at $2.45B
item.description: Coinbase's latest investment lifts CoinDCX's valuation from $2.15 billion to $2.45 billion.

item.title: Storm decimates 2 Alaskan villages and drives more than 1,500 people from their homes
item.description: Officials in Alaska are rushing to find housing for people from tiny coastal villages devastated by the remnants of Typhoon Halong.
